price: Kuma idan sun karkata zuwa ga zaman lãfiya, to, ka karkata zuwa gare shi, kuma ka dõgara ga Allah: Lalle ne Shĩ, Mai ji ne Masani.
arabic: ۞ وَإِن جَنَحُواْ لِلسَّلۡمِ فَٱجۡنَحۡ لَهَا وَتَوَكَّلۡ عَلَى ٱللَّهِۚ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلسَّمِيعُ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-in janaḥū lilssalmi fa-ij'naḥ lahā watawakkal ʿalā al-lahi innahu huwa al-samīʿu al-ʿalīmu
